hero.title: UWB Schedule Planner
hero.description: Create your perfect student schedule easily and quickly. Our application helps you optimize your time at the University of West Bohemia even before official enrollment in IS/STAG.

functions.intro: The UWB Schedule Planner application helps you optimize your time and prepare for the semester with the following capabilities:

func1.title: Pre-Enrollment Planning
func1.desc: Assemble your schedule even before the official enrollment period in the IS/STAG university system. Gain an advantage by better planning and optimizing your time. [cite: 3]

func2.title: Intuitive Schedule Visualization
func2.desc: Clearly view all your enrolled courses and their scheduled activities throughout the week. The application emphasizes a clear user interface. [cite: 5, 7]

func3.title: IS/STAG Course Import
func3.desc: Easily load current data about courses and their schedule events directly from IS/STAG. Import options include by course code or your entire study plan. [cite: 4, 41, 73, 74]

func4.title: Optimal Schedule Generator
func4.desc: Automatically generate suggestions for possible schedule variants. Simply choose your preferences, such as a day off, and the system will try to find the best solution. [cite: 4, 176]

func5.title: Workspace Management
func5.desc: Save all your loaded courses, the currently assembled schedule, and your personal preferences. You can return anytime and continue planning. [cite: 173, 174, 175]

func6.title: Schedule Export and Print
func6.desc: Easily save your created schedule as a PNG image for sharing, or print it directly for offline use. [cite: 206]

tech.reactDesc: A JavaScript library for dynamic user interfaces, ensuring the application's smoothness and interactivity.
tech.muiDesc: A React component library that provides robust and customizable elements in line with Material Design.
tech.viteDesc: A next-generation frontend tooling that offers lightning-fast cold starts and instant hot module replacement during development.
tech.i18nextDesc: A flexible internationalization framework, enabling easy translation of the application into multiple languages.

author.summary: This Schedule Planner was created as as term project fo KIV/UUR course with the aim of simplifying students' organization of their academic life and to learn React.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.q1: What is the purpose of this application?
faqPage.a1: The application allows UWB students to plan their course schedule before official enrollment, helping them to optimize their time. [cite: 2, 3]
faqPage.a2: Primarily for students of the University of West Bohemia in Pilsen who can create their own schedule. [cite: 6]
